```{r libraries, include=FALSE}
library(DoE.base)
library(formattable)
library(tidyverse)
library(reactablefmtr)
```

# Creating Experimental Designs

defining variables for each type

```{r}
factor_definitions <- list(
  Blocks = 1:3,
  in_vhc_time = c(10, 15, 20),
  wtng_time = c(5, 10, 15),
  n_xfer = c(0, 1, 2),
  comfort = c("uncomfortable", "comfortable"),
  cost_car = c(6, 9,12),
  fare = c(6, 9,12)
)
```

## Scenarios

creation of scenarios

```{r}
plan <-
  oa.design(factor.names = factor_definitions) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  arrange(Blocks) %>%
  group_by(Blocks) %>%
  mutate(Scenario = row_number()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  relocate(Scenario, .after = Blocks)
```

```{r}
plan <-plan %>% 
  mutate(
    in_vhc_time=in_vhc_time %>% 
      as.character() %>% 
      as.integer() %>% 
      suffix(" min"),
    wtng_time =wtng_time  %>% 
      as.character() %>% 
      as.integer() %>% 
      suffix(" min"),    
    cost_car =cost_car  %>% 
      as.character() %>% 
      as.integer() %>% 
      suffix(" tl"),   
    fare  =fare   %>% 
      as.character() %>% 
      as.integer() %>% 
      suffix(" tl")  
    )
```

table of scenarios

```{r}

plan %>%

  formattable(list(
    comfort = formatter(
      "span",
      style = ~style(
        display = "block", 
        padding = "0 4px", 
        `border-radius` = "4px", 
        `background-color` = ifelse(comfort == "comfortable", 
                                    "orange", "white"))
    ),
    in_vhc_time = color_tile("white", "orange"),
    wtng_time = color_tile("white", "orange"),
    n_xfer = color_tile("white", "orange"),
    wtng_time = color_tile("white", "orange"),
    cost_car = color_tile("white", "orange"),
    fare = color_tile("white", "orange"),
    Blocks = color_tile("lightgreen" ,"lightpink")
    ))
```
